sen.e: Emperor GO-REIZEI (August 28th, 1025 - May 22nd 1068) was the 70th Japanese Emperor. (his reign was 1045 - 1068)

sen.j: 後の鳥羽天皇や二条天皇、後堀河天皇にも中宮・皇后となった后妃が3人いたが、同時期に3人の后が並立したのは後冷泉天皇が唯一である。
sen.e: Emperor GO-REIZEI was the only Emperor having three Empresses at the same time although later on, Emperor TOBA, Emperor NIJO and Emperor GO-HORIKAWA had three Empresses including the second consort of the Emperor.

sen.j: 初めに立后されたのは章子で、次いで寛子が立后されたが、寛子立后にあたり、通常ならば先立の中宮である章子を皇后、寛子を中宮とするところを、章子の希望で章子は中宮のまま留め置かれ、寛子が皇后とされた。
sen.e: Firstly Shoshi officially became an Empress followed by Kanshi, in a natural manner Shoshi would have become Empress and Kanshi being the second consort of the Emperor, however due to Shoshi's request, Kanshi became Empress and Shoshi was kept as the second consort of the Emperor.

sen.j: その後、天皇の死の直前に歓子が立后されたが、歓子立后にあたっては中宮章子が皇太后、皇后寛子が中宮とされ、歓子は皇后とされた。
sen.e: Later on just before the Emperor died, Kanshi officially became the third Empress, on this occasion, second consort of the Emperor, Shoshi became Empress Dowager and the Empress Kanshi became second consort of the Emperor, and the last Kanshi became the Empress.
